name: Your Bedroom
longDesc:
This is your first time in the bedroom.
The exit is to the hallway, on the west wall.
There is a bed against the north wall, you store your treasures underneath it.
There is a bed side table with a lamp next to your bed, pushed up against the east wall at the head of the bed.
On the south wall is your closet.
It has a chute that leads to the basement where the laundry room is.
There are diry socks on the floor of your closet.
There is a dog whistle on the floor underneath the bed.
description:
This is your bedroom.
The exit is to the hallway, on the west wall.
There is a bed against the north wall, you store your treasures underneath it.
There is a bed side table with a lamp next to your bed, pushed up against the east wall at the head of the bed.
On the south wall is your closet.
It has a chute that leads to the basement where the laundry room is.

closet.name: closet
closet.description: The closet is full of toys.  At the back of the closet is a laundry chute leading to the basement.

under the bed.name: under the bed
under the bed.description: Under the bed is dark, it's smelly, but there are no monsters...you think
under the bed.discoveryStatement: That's where the dog whistle went!

dog whistle.name: dog whistle
dog whistle.description: The dog whistle is small and silver. Use it to summon your mighty steed

dirty socks.name: dirty socks
dirty socks.description: Your socks are all identical black, crew cut socks that can be bought in ten packs at the store. These ones are stinky but also important
